name: Villa #1
description: A Comfortable 3 Bedroom villa located near Mahabalipuram with private pool.

name: Villa #2
description:
Enjoy a perfect getaway with private beach access, a refreshing swimming pool, and 4 cozy bedrooms for a comfortable stay.
Relax on the spacious lawn, enjoy music with in-house speakers, and stay worry-free with power backup and car parking.

name: Villa #3
description:
Experience a spacious 4BHK luxury villa in Kovalam, just a short walk from the beach.
Enjoy a private swimming pool, small lawn, AV hall, bar table, and fully equipped kitchen across three floors.
With 24/7 power backup, WiFi, TV, and a dedicated caretaker, your stay is comfortable and hassle-free.
amenities: 4BHK Luxury Villa (1 Ground Floor, 2 First Floor, 1 Second Floor)

name: Villa #4
description: A private 4BHK villa in Uthandi, located opposite PVR Cinemas and just 400m from the beach, Enjoy a fully private house with a spacious hall, basic kitchen setup, double-door fridge, and a 30x15 ft swimming pool with a cozy lawn space. All rooms are air-conditioned with king-size beds, and a caretaker is available throughout your stay.
amenities: Spacious Hall with Dining and Living Area
Basic Kitchen with Induction, Kettle & Utensils
